medical_history.chief_complaint: RUQ and epigastric pain, nausea, and nonbloody nonbilious emesis
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient has a 12 hour history of symptoms; previously endorsed frequent GERD symptoms after meals but has never experienced symptoms like these before. No changes in bowel habits, no bloody stools, no fevers.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of gastric ulcer, H. pylori treated with triple therapy, past surgical history includes C-section and trans-vaginal uterine fibroid removal.
medical_history.family_history: Non contributory, no known history of colon cancer.
